Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class CardHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.CardHandler
public class CardHandler extends Object
This class is responsible for handling the cards of the game.

    • importGoldCards

      public ArrayList<GoldCard> importGoldCards() throws CardNotImportedException
      Create a list of GoldCards and link them
      Returns:
      the list of gold cards with their other side
      Throws:
      CardNotImportedException - if a card is not imported correctly or if a card is not linked correctly

    • checkRequirements

      public boolean checkRequirements(PlayableCard card, Player player) throws CardTypeMismatchException
      Check if the selected card Requirements are satisfied by the player
      Parameters:
      card - is the selected card
      player - is the player how want to play the card
      Returns:
      true if the player can use the card, false otherwise
      Throws:
      CardTypeMismatchException - if the cardType is not a RESOURCE or GOLD card
